SELECT P.PAY_KEY , P.RECEIPT_KEY , P.HOSPITALIZE_RECORD_KEY , P.PAY_CHECK , P.PAY_DATE , P.PAY_TOTAL_COST
, R.PATIENT_KEY, R.RECEIPT_STATUS , PAT.PATIENT_NAME, PAT.PATIENT_AGE , PAT.PATIENT_SEX, PAT.PATIENT_REGNO1, PAT.PATIENT_REGNO2
, PD.PAY_DETAIL_KEY, PD.PAY_KIND, ST.PAY_KIND_NAME, PD.PAY_COST, PD.PAY_PERCENTAGE
, M.CHART_KEY, M.EMP_KEY, M.CHART_DATE, M.CHART_CONT
FROM PAY P INNER JOIN PAY_DETAIL PD ON (P.PAY_KEY = PD.PAY_KEY) INNER JOIN STANDARD_OF_PAY ST ON (ST.PAY_KIND = PD.PAY_KIND ) INNER JOIN RECEIPT R ON (R.RECEIPT_KEY = P.RECEIPT_KEY) INNER JOIN MEDICAL_CHART M ON (R.RECEIPT_KEY = M.RECEIPT_KEY) INNER JOIN PATIENT PAT ON (R.PATIENT_KEY = PAT.PATIENT_KEY) INNER JOIN WAITING_HISTORY W ON (W.RECEIPT_KEY = R.RECEIPT_KEY) WHERE R.RECEIPT_STATUS = 'RS01' AND W.WAITING_LOCATION = 'L008' ORDER BY PAY_KEY DESC

SELECT PAY_DETAIL_KEY , PAY_KEY , PAY_KIND , (SELECT PAY_KIND_NAME FROM STANDARD_OF_PAY S WHERE S.PAY_KIND = P.PAY_KIND) AS PAY_KIND_NAME , PAY_COST , PAY_PERCENTAGE , CASE PAY_KIND WHEN 'PK03' THEN TRUNC(PAY_COST * ((100-PAY_PERCENTAGE)/100),-2) + 5000 WHEN 'PK04' THEN TRUNC(PAY_COST * ((100-PAY_PERCENTAGE)/100),-2) + 5000 ELSE TRUNC(PAY_COST * ((100-PAY_PERCENTAGE)/100),-2) END AS PAY_COST_PATIENT FROM PAY_DETAIL P WHERE PAY_KEY = #{payKey}
